name: My First Furry
description: Short puzzle game with beautiful furry girls. Relaxing music and cozy yet spicy atmosphere. Awesome for relax after a day at work.

name: Flying Sofa Simulator
description: Finally, travel the world without getting up off the sofa!

name: A Short Tale of Solitude
description: A Short Tale of Solitude is an adventure horror game, combining exploration, puzzles and survival where the gameplay is focused on fear mechanics.

name: Super Marble Brothers
description: Precision 3D platform game with cooperative or single player challenges above the clouds.

name: Move Dodge and Kill
description: Dodge the enemies shot and kill them with different weapons. Move, Dodge and Kill is a rogue-lite dungeon crawler in a neon environment.

name: Freedom Physics
description: Put your creativity to the test! Use the in game tools to build a purely physics driven level. Create and Engineer your own character/object to control and use in the level. Go nuts with the many settings, object attributes & freedom to create any number of objects, events & scenarios.

name: RevolVR 3
description: RevolVR 3 is a single- and multiplayer casual shooter staged in the robotic version of the Wild West. Socialize with friends in the saloon, play mini-games and participate in fast-paced deathmatches versus people or bots!

name: Get to Work, Succubus-Chan!
description: Enter your own erotic dream and play this shoot-em up where you can customize your attacks.

name: Returning the favor of the dog
description: Living together with lovely dog-eared girl simulator. One snowy winter day, I picked up a dog shivering in the cold at a shrine. Heartbroken by my family's misfortune, I decided to take good care of this dog at least. and one day it became a dog-eared girl.

name: Urban Fantasy: Vampires vs Werewolves
description: Conquer the real world cities in UF: Vampires vs Werewolves. Play as either Vampires or Werewolves and get rid of your enemies before they expand while making sure that Humans never notice you. Manage your resources, units and use your special abilities to make sure they never come back to this city

name: Anagrams
description: Match colorful tiles & solve 1400+ brain-teasing anagrams across 4 unique game modes in this relaxing puzzler

name: Desolation Tycoon
description: Travel and trade in a demon-haunted post-apocalypse. Each playthrough features a new character and a partially randomized world. Between playthroughs, the world around you will grow and develop in response to your actions. Be prepared to make hard decisions.

name: My Boyfriend's a Werecat!
description: You are Zack Kuroneko, a 20-something college grad living blissfully with his long term boyfriend, Spencer Waters. One day, however, Zack begins to notice something strange. Feels strange. The sun feels so nice to lay in, and the birds look all too fun to chase. Zack has become a Werecat!

name: Messier111
description: The Messier 111 is a twin-stick shooter that will test your skills.

name: Zombie Derby: Pixel Survival
description: Smash your way through hordes of zombies and countless obstacles in a rip-roaring racing arcade. Experience the zombie apocalypse like you’ve never seen it before. Eradicating zombies has never been so colorful, exciting, and engaging before.

name: Sluggy Jean Takes a Hike
description: Sluggy Jean is a game utilizing a unique puzzle-platformer style!

name: The Chronicles of Hercules: The 12 Labours
description: In this epic match3 game. you join Hercules, one of the most famous heroes of mythology, the demi-god son of Zeus. With Iolaus' help you have to solve 12 tasks and slay unstoppable beasts.

name: System Intrusion
description: Welcome to the virtual realm, where every byte matters in your struggle to restore balance as you fight against the an artificial enemy programmed to assimilate the entirety of virtual space.

name: Star Maidens Chronicle: Definitive Edition
description: Overview"Star Maidens Chronicle" requires you to handle ever-changing battlefield situations.Your goal is to become the commander of a powerful Faction and destroy enemy strongholds.To fulfill your ambition, you must establish a city, raise an army and become strong enough to overwhelm your opponents.

name: Innocent Girl
description: Great game modes, consisting of a different of nice games with innocent girls. Exiting atmosphere, great SFX, levels with beautiful artworks.

name: Mia
description: Mia is a PC multiplayer survival game set inside a fictional reality show against the backdrop of an authoritarian past. It focuses on ad-hoc team building and showcasing players’ personalities through voice chat. Social manipulation may be key to victory.

name: Pincushion
description: In this little game you have to throw needles into the needle bed

name: Halley's Dream
description: Halley's Dream is a beautiful third-person adventure walking simulator game about a husky dog and his dreams. When dreaming, the dog will enjoy an amazing journey in a stylized and colourful world, learn about the wonders of our universe and make friends.

name: Bomber Dudes
description: Bomber Dudes is a classic Bomberman inspired game where you can bomb zombies and your friends!

name: Evil Cucumber
description: Evil Cucumber is a first-person satirical horror movie in which you play the role of a cat. Your task is to face the possessed cucumbers that have haunted your home. Get out of the mansion as soon as possible. Defend yourself with claws, jump over enemies, use your cat's agility to run away.

name: Ignatius
description: Ignatius is a atmospheric puzzle-platformer game with an interesting story. The game with its visual form and plot refers to the old silent movies.

name: Zaacar
description: Destruction and chaos on a whole new level is guaranteed when you enter the Zaacar : Ultimate Race of the century. Custom build the most deadly combat car ever devised and battle up 50 other players in a massive race where the winner takes it all. Are you ready to face the Zaacar?

name: Laser Chess: Deflection
description: Obliterate the enemy's king with your laser by strategically moving/rotating mirrors, portals and more in this mind-bending chess-like game. Challenge your friends or battle an AI (includes Level Editor)!

name: Opus Ludum
description: Opus Ludum is a game of wit and skill, where you will have to overcome various challenges that will test your razor-sharp intellect at every step. Opus Ludum will give you a break from daily stress, although it might just break your head.

name: Uncle Ted
description: Uncle Ted - A top-down logic game where the player dodges bullets and bounces them in the direction of enemies in order to kill them, when the player deals with all the enemies, the game is transferred to the next room of the house with new locations of objects.

name: Sweet and Cute
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: The Benjamins
description: The Benjamins is a business tycoon / harem building simulation. Recruit girls, train them and put them to work. You'll need to improve your street cred and keep your bankroll growing to succeed in the adult industry.

name: Aeon Blood
description: A brief game description A. Aeon blood is a Beat'em up game played from a 2D perspective based on 3D modeling. B. It consists of 7 chapter. Each chapter is consists of several sectors. C. only supports Single play. D. It supports keyboard and mouse control. E. 12 Age Rating Game.

name: Rugida
description: The girl ended up in the dungeons. And although her heart is now barely beating, she still hopes to get her soul back. The dungeon is just the beginning of the journey. And it is already teeming with everything that can be teeming with. Will you help her on this difficult journey?

name: Fate in the Darkness
description: RPG-sandbox in board game style, with a gothic fantasy atmosphere. А living own life world, which you can interact through the game character, attended events, tasks and game deck. The goal of this project is to port board game.

name: Cowboys n' Stuff
description: Cowboys n' Stuff is a 2D, Top-down, wave-survival orientated game where you control and customise your cowboy in order to eliminate threats as they arrive; whether it is day or night...

name: Maniac Path 2
description: Maniac Path 2-this is the continuation of a crazy game about a maniac who has to kill a lot of his victims.

name: Ducktopia
description: Become a mayor of your own city filled with ducks! Build your city up as you would like it, while making sure your ducks stay happy, healthy and productive, otherwise they may steal your duckeronies. Create the perfect city then you may end up with your own Ducktopia!

name: Ecchi Jack
description: Welcome to the Casino XXX! Cute girls are ready to serve you. You can play blackjack, chat with girls, or even undress them. Search for the key to get intimate with a girl. Or just stare at her chest.

name: Wait! Where's My Lunch
description: Wait! Where's My Lunch!? is an over-the-top stealth adventure game from Magic Dragon Studios. Follow Bryce, while he embarks on important quest in the middle of a world ending apocalypse. What is his quest? To find the most important survival item… his lunch!

name: Seblen: Battle!
description: Seblen: Battle is a quick and easy to learn, but difficult to master card game for single players and online 1v1 Versus mode. The launch is releasing with: 40 Seblen Character Cards 10 Specialty Skill Cards 6 Rarity Tiers

name: Escape from hospital
description: You have to get out of a hospital filled with zombies. In the course of the passage, you need to inspect all the places so as not to miss something important. A large arsenal from knife to flamethrower, but a limited amount of ammunition will make you think about their consumption.

name: Snaaker & Friends
description: What do you get if you cross Snake with Snooker, Pool, and Football? Join Snaaker, Paal and Faatball in the ultimate game of Snakes and Balls to find out.

name: Happy Bones
description: After receiving a message from her father who has been missing for the last 4 years, Laura heads out to a house located inside a cult compound to search for her parents, and the truth.

name: Keizudo
description: Keizudo is a command based visual novel that uses pre-rendered low polygon graphics. It has a sci-fi romance story with cyberpunk aesthetics reminiscent of 90s video games and anime.

name: BasCatball Saturn: Basketball & Cat
description: Play basketball. In Saturn. With cats. Are you ready for the whole galaxy's hardest matches? Solve puzzles and win the Bascatball intergalactic championship!

name: Realm of Alters
description: "Realm of Alters" is a turn-based strategy card game. A clear vision of card play orders and knowing which card to sacrifice to generate resources are the keys to victory.

name: Shadow Redemption
description: Shadow Redemption is a truly free MMORPG where you play a 2D game in a 3D perspective. Play casually, or take the game more seriously. The world of Lightwell calls upon you, answer the call and become a Warchief.

name: Variables 2
description: After two years of precipitation, we re-made this variable sequel after thinking about it! Variable 2 is a unique stand-alone tower defense game. We have enriched the building and elements of tower defense, and the experience in the game can be changed according to your ideas!

name: Fireworks Simulator: Realistic
description: This is the best fireworks simulator, lighting fireworks will bring good luck, and your world will be colorful.

name: Kingdomfall
description: Kingdomfall is a multiplayer PvP fantasy slasher with action packed, player-skill based combat system.

name: Through the Frame
description: Race through the frames with your grappling hook and reach the finish line as quickly as possible to get the highest score and beat the other players!

name: Live Empire
description: Live empire is a kind of simulated business game that generates revenue by simulating the live broadcast of the anchor. simulated operation free scheduling

name: The Last Pirate Adventure: Drake's Treasure
description: Rum. Pillage. Gunshots. Far away that is, only vague memories of the legend of Captain Drake's treasure. The golden age of piracy is long gone, but who tells there is not one last chapter to write?

name: My Territory Was Witches' Island!?
description: Territory Management X Tower Defense SLG

name: Girl Next Door
description: A naughty anthology of domestic encounters gone wild. In this 3D Visual Novel/Sim hybrid, you’ll get to know the neighbors reaaal well. Every inch of them!

name: Animal Rescue
description: Animal Rescue is a unique game in which you play the role of a field rescuer-vet. Face the elements of nature and save innocent animals! Their life depends entirely on you! Someone has to save them! Will it be you?

name: Heal Hitler
description:
This game was created by one developer and two voice actors.
It is a psychologist simulator taking place in 1925, before Hitler came to power.
It is a game about resolving Hitler's trauma and preventing catastrophe via therapy and psychology.

name: Lisa and the Grimoire
description: Hoping to hit a big payday and pull herself from a life of poverty, Lisa heads to a town with a rumored demonic artifact. But upon arriving, she quickly realizes she has gotten herself into a dangerous situation.

name: Restricted Area
description: Restricted Area - Play as a soldier in an abandoned world. Survive amongst dangerous zombies. Search for supplies and weapons. Save the world from a dangerous virus.

name: Game of Mafia
description: Game Of Mafia is an adventure game set in New York City in the mid-1920s. You play as Frank, an ordinary postman whose quiet life changes dramatically when he meets his old friend. Opening your own bar sounds much better than delivering packages for the rest of life.

name: The Sea Hotel: Umineko Tei
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Rescue: Code Pink
description: A point-and-click adventure game filled with irreverent comedy and titillating sexual content! One spaceship, one loveable repair guy, tons of sexy women- you know where this is going.

name: Bikini Girls
description: A classic puzzle game in which you have to rearrange the cubes.

name: Mage World: The Wizard's Stone
description: "Mage World: The Wizard's Stone" offers a mystical platformer journey, on your adventure you need to beat bosses to get new spells. Be the heroine in 79+ levels and bring back the peace to the kingdom of Mage World.

name: Deer Hunter x Treme Focal Plane
description: It's open season! The deer are overpopulating as we speak. Sgt. O'doyle must thin the herd!

name: Spish
description: A multiplayer PvP harpoon warrior game

name: Counter Operation Online
description: Counter Operation Online ( COO ) revived by the hurricane team game COO, includes maps, weapons, game modes, as well as an incredibly realistic confrontation with terrorists.

name: Castle Itter: The Strangest Battle of WWII
description: The Battle for Castle Itter is a solitaire card driven tabletop boardgame.

name: Succubuses Love Creampie
description: Succubus Dominance - is a game linking “bullet hell” and “hot succubus”.

name: Coffee with Prescilla
description: 18+ Adults Only Content It is a choice-driven episodic Adult Visual Novel(AVN) mini-game that gets right to the point.

name: Terrene: An Evidence of Life Game
description: Explore a vast open pixel world full of dangerous enemies, ancient ruins, abandoned space stations and more.

name: Sinkr 3
description: Sinkr 3 is the culmination of the award winning minimalist puzzler series. SiNKR 3 offers a new slant on the familiar contraptions with new diagonal layouts and billiards-style physics. BY PLAYER DEMAND: multi-step undo.

name: My First Date RPG
description: In the "My First Date RPG" series, play as characters who experience a big part of growing up: going out on your first date!

name: Nation War 2: Chronicle
description: NationWar 2.0 is a big strategy game based on the theme of the Spring and Autumn and Warring States period. There are more than 60 countries to choose from in the game. Map 1: 1 restores the mountainous landscapes and rivers of China.

name: Pablo Let's Go Bar
description: A co-op roguelike FPS game where the player has to get through the map by killing enemies in his way, picking up random weapons, and gaining random perks. He fights his way from street to street to get to the bar, bring some friends or go it alone and enjoy a hell of a journey.

name: Little Gods of the Abyss
description: Go on a trip to heal the mysterious and beautiful world of the soul. Visit various stages that express the complex emotions of the Soul World. Open closed doors to heal broken hearts and experience beautiful stories.

name: Vampires' Melody
description: 3 centuries have passed after sleeping for one night!? On a rainy night filled with thunderstorms, a young chef Raylan encountered a mysterious girl who resembled Sleeping Beauty in a huge tree hole, but everything suddenly went black before he could find out what happened...

name: Dungen
description: A fun roguelike with cards, which differs from the rest in one small detail: for each card you pay with your health. Who will kill you faster, the enemy or yourself?

name: S.C.A.R
description: Created by Savage Studios, S.C.A.R is a retro-like monster killing game, where the enemies have one goal, to see your demise. Difficulty is not forgiving, your survival is almost impossible...

name: Scars of Summer
description: A slice of life RPG. Due to family circumstances, Keita finds himself living with his childhood friend Ryoka for the summer. Explore a contemporary Japanese setting, and enjoy spending time with Ryoka.

name: Who Are You?
description: Surviving is the key point of this game, you need to act as a prisoner and escape from that place in a first-person perspective.

name: Lrrl or Rllr
description: LRRL or RLLR is a puzzle game in which you enjoy increasing your score by choosing left or right according to one recursive rule. You can enjoy it as long as you don't make the wrong choice. All choices are divided to the left or right when you start, and either contains all of your later choices.

name: Ink.
description: Ink. is a semi-procedural/random RPG action shooter. You'll play in a blank book, trying to write your story as a small ink creature but with great powers. Start your adventure, fight bosses, find items and discover new incredible synergies and combos.

name: CurryKitten FPV Simulator
description: Take charge of a powerful and acrobatic quadcopter and learn to fly it around the mountainous landscape. Rip through the partly-constructed building site, bash into the beach ball, chase cars, or fly up close and personal with an AI plane. Play it solo, or online with friends.

name: Angel Tears
description: Angel Tears is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: The BridgeMaster
description: The kingdom is collapsing! Use your combined powers of logic & magic to help the townsfolk find a path to escape. Sacrifice the village - Build bridges - Save the villagers!

name: 7n7
description: 7n7 is a 2D, bullet-hell platformer, set in a world inspired by World War 1. Unlock new weapons and find a clever way to destroy 14 bosses that you may find on your path. Experience the story in non-combat levels with plenty of NPCs and the main character.

name: Military Base War
description: Top Down Shooter, Face a group of enemies where each type has its own behavior, trying to either destroy you or the blue cube that you have to protect. Eliminate all enemies in the stage, then move to the next stage

name: Modern War Simulator: Advance Under Air Raid
description: This is a war shooting game. Wear a helmet and drive a tank to avoid the heavy artillery fire of the enemy air force. At the same time, you can pass through the lines of defense of the enemy turret and finally reach the goal of victory.

name: StreamGods: Streamer Tycoon
description: The ultimate streamer life simulation! RPG simulation featuring in-game AI-powered social network, robust Room Build mode and a ton of customizations.

name: Devil Edge
description: This is a magic and adventure action game, the game designed a number of demon scene, including Miguel City, pyramid magic Road, Paria volcano, Tavla castle, Beka jungle, blue city cave, etc. The high difficulty level design, the unceasingly rich magic skill, will let you indulge in it.

name: Rocks'n'Gems
description:
Rocks'n'Gems is a 2D puzzle game based on the 80's classic 'Boulder Dash'

It was developed by Gerhard Rittenhofer via the Net Yaroze PS1 development kit and released as a full game on the Official UK Playstation Magazine's demo disc 16, volume 2.

name: Shanghai1920
description: This game is a suspenseful visual novel style game, Players will play a 20th century police in Shanghai, China, Discover the hidden story and truth behind the murder through exploration and investigation.

name: Tower of Ardia
description: With her sister's health in decline, Rayla searches for a legendary magic called Ardia. Her search brings her to a foreboding tower where it is said this power resides.

name: Little Devourers
description: Little Devourers is a casual and relaxing game in which you control a black hole that does a great cleaning.

name: Gun Soul Girl 2
description: You will play a girl, roaming in the desert wasteland of science fiction, experiencing the feeling of emptiness and immersion. Find the meaning of survival and the understanding of life.

name: Memories of War: Undead Decimation
description: Memories of War: Undead Decimation is a fast paced third person shooter. Save the world single handedly or with a 4 player squad. Journey through different landscapes as you take on the undead. Can you defeat the undead?

name: Star Tank
description: Star Tank is a tribute to the arcades of the early 1980s (Galaxian, Galaga, Space Invaders, Missile Command) and games from the early 1990s (Operation Wolf, Cabal). Show your skills with the controls and become an outstanding pilot of a Startank.

name: Countess in Crimson
description: Countess in Crimson is an erotic visual novel / adventure game hybrid with a horror theme. Uncover the dark secrets of the secluded Carpathian village while engaging in passionate romance along the way.

name: Matchsticks: Coffee Break Club
description: We’ve been taught not to play with fire, but the matches of this game aren’t going to burn you! Challenge your mind moving, adding and removing matchsticks until you find the correct solution. How many tries do you need to solve each level?

name: Welcome to the Adventurer Inn!
description: Having just opened an inn, you set out to create a comfortable environment to bring in tired adventurers looking for respite after their questing. Earn money, upgrade your inn, and befriend a diverse cast of characters!

name: Small Ball
description: This is a casual game,control small ball arrive at the destination,include 4 mini games

name: This Rain Will Never End
description: You are in a noir adventure game where you will play a cat detective who needs to investigate the suicide of the Mayor of Sunny city. Suddenly the rain started to drop endlessly and no one knows why.

name: Survival RPG 2: The Temple Ruins
description: A magical artifact lying among the ruins of a lost temple? Embark on a journey full of adventure, quests and exploration. You will need your survival skills in this retro 2d pixel art universe. Survival RPG 2: The Temple Ruins is the sequel of the first retro game Survival RPG: The Lost Treasure.

name: The Deep
description: Marine biologist Joel Price was sent to alien planet R-Aqua to help searchers find out why the marine life there was lasting for so long.

name: Marswar TD
description: Get ready for the most entertaining 3D tower defense game to give hours and hours of the best strategy gaming and protect the first extraterrestrial civilization against an unknown enemy.

name: Circular
description: Circular is an arcade scoring game.

name: The USB Stick Found in the Grass
description: This is a forensic challenge game – find out who the owner of the USB stick was and reconstruct their story.

name: Street Karate 3
description: Street karate 3 is a game in the genre of Beat'em up, in which you have to fight in an unequal duel with many opponents.

name: Rainbow Laser Disco Dungeon
description: Rainbow Laser Disco Dungeon is part twin stick-shooter, part rhythm game, part dungeon crawler. Every action, every laser blast and robot explosion, happens according the rhythm of the music. Pick up your weapons and get ready to dance!

name: Cursed Mummies
description: Cursed Mummies is a classic Sokoban. With each level, the task will become more difficult!

name: Flappy Bee
description: Flappy Bee is a high-score chasing thrill ride based upon staying alive while dodging lava and birds. Press the Space bar to fly or click the screen to dodge obstacles and keep your lives for as long as possible.

name: Allotropy
description: A game in the genre of "survival game". Your goal is to live as many as possible. One of the main tasks is to look for food, thirst. Look for shelter. Look for ammo boxes. Lots of firearms. There are also melee weapons. Several types of enemies. Do your best to survive.

name: Lost Dream
description: Discover the world from the eyes of a fox. Explore the unknown and rescue your captured friend

name: Galvatia
description: Galvatia is a PC game where you are an invisible conservationist for animals. It contains 5-enviroments such as a European meadow, a mixed forest, an American rainforest, an African savannah and an ocean.

name: Outland Rapture
description: Three strangers wake up in a mysterious place and working together without being noticed is the only way to survive all the dangers and return home.

name: Traffic City
description: Choose the city, you can freely drive in the city, mark the location, use the shortest path navigation.

name: Fragmented Mind
description: Fragmented Mind is a single player short indie horror game, starts when you wake up and find yourself in a strange house, going through series of paranormal events related to a crime happened in this house years ago .

name: Sqwark! A Nutty Adventure
description: Sqwark is just your average Green parrot who lives at 85 Acorn Drive. But when some multidimensional beings show up and attempt to take every delicious nut in the world to use as fuel for their weird and wonderful contraptions, he has to do something about it.

name: Mini Words: Polyglot
description: The most used nouns in English. Can you recognize them in another language? Unscramble frequently used words in a unique mix of logic puzzle, word search, and hangman.

name: Fates Call: A New Beginning
description: Fates Call: A New Beginning ! Embark in an epic VR Fantasy RPG You are Talos, a hero that has been awaken by ancient ghosts save the world once again. Evil forces are plotting against peace, you need to stop them before it's too late. Explore the world of Fates Call today !

name: Atomic Cards
description: Collect food, weapons and materials, face enemies and make difficult moral choices that will affect the gameplay.

name: Operation TP
description: A Post-Apocalyptic store run gone wrong, keep moving, don't get hit, get that TP!

name: Pixie Farm VR
description: Pixie Farm VR is a pixie raising simulation VR game where you raise only pixies in a world that seems to have dragons and phoenixes!

name: Super Retro Fighter
description: Classic STG game Have fun with your friends just like your childhood!

name: Alias
description: Alias is an abstract game designed for a company of at least 4 people. This is exactly what will help to distract yourself from the external fuss. Guess the guessing word through associations and explanations. Spend time playing in the same room, or play it online from a distance.

name: Age of Albuvia
description: Play as a young, peaceful mage who will soon hold the destiny of the peoples of Albvia in his hands. Go on an adventure and try to solve the riddle of the reappearance of evil.

name: Megania Online
description: Megania online is a fantasy medieval world set in the Age of Dragons. Many adventures and puzzles await you, but you will also have to face players in clan wars, mythological creatures, monster raids, powerful final bosses ...

name: Ero Tennis
description: Play tennis and admire the girl.

name: Training Grounds
description: Make your way through unique and challenging gun courses as fast as possible while clearing all red targets and avoiding green ones. Compete for the fastest times!

name: The King of Warriors: Battle in the Three Kingdoms
description: Who will be the King of Warriors? Defeat a great deal of enemies using various skills and Special moves! The King of Warriors(KOW) - Battle in the Three Kingdoms - is a Beat'em up game in the battlefields of ancient China!

name: Long Car Journey
description: Traverse the never-ending desert searching for provisions. Look for fuel, fix the engine, pay attention to the battery, change the turbo charger! Explore abandoned buildings, sell the objects you find, check the condition of your car. Collect provisions and hide them at home!

name: Andromeda 2 Zombies
description: Andromeda 2 Zombies is an First Person Shooter video game featuring zombies. The game take place in the far future where spatial exploration of galaxy is possible. A virus has spread and now zombies are rampant. The hero is in the military and try to bring order in the Andromeda galaxy.

name: Alien Cat 3
description: Having found his home on one of the distant planets, the space cat decides to settle down on it. But the local creatures did not appreciate this choice and decide to drive away the furry alien. Our task is very simple, to protect yourself and your shelter from the attacks of unfriendly monsters.

name: Menagerie: Archive
description: You have been lucky enough to be tasked with sorting the files in one of many archives across the land. However, you must share your income with 3 fellow citizens of a similar rank, and consequently decide their fate.

name: Signals
description: Signals is a casual planet hopper strategy game. Explore systems, harvest resources and repair alien devices. You’ll need to strategically work with the market to maximize your income while covering the cost of your operation in order to follow strange signals and discover what waits at the source.

name: Orb Tour
description: Snowy the snowcone is an alien who has been asleep for many years. When he wakes up, his people have VANISHED! He is the last of his kind, and he needs your help to find all 30 of the missing power orbs, so he can rebuild the mothership and bring his people back, before they face extinction.

name: Ties
description: Explore an oniric world and discover all its secrets during a dangerous and memorable quest.

name: Slime with a Sword
description: Enjoy the latest in slime simulation technology from Quantum Isles as you try to survive this grassy gauntlet.

name: Bunny's Ban
description: An adorable and relaxing puzzle game for people who love cute pets

name: Varmalis
description: Old-school psychological horror inspired by Silent Hill series, based on exploration of abandoned places, combat with monsters, puzzles solving and objects and texts to find. Vincent remembers a murder he never witnessed. What if his memories were mixed with those of a real killer?

name: The Last Islands of Man
description: The Last Islands of Man is a retro rpg that forces you to manage your time. The waters are rising. Can you save yourself? Can you save your family?

name: Magia X
description: The Real Fantasy 2D Action, Magia X. Splendid actions beyond the limits of 2D, unique characters, breathtaking adventures, and warm pastel-colored world awaits you. Stimulate your action urges.

name: World of Asgabas
description: What happens when a Viking meets a Cowboy? He fights him, of course! The World is not big enough for both of them. World of Asgabas is a turn-based strategy game opposing multiple factions fighting to dominate the world!

name: Among Us Arena
description: Among Us Arena is a 2D multiplayer fighting game based on the game Among Us.

name: Escape From the Chaotic City
description: It's the Apocalypse! It's an experiment! It's just a movie! Armed just with a bat and courage, Eddy, an idle teen has to turn into a hero..in one night... But outside, on those desolates streets of Portland, the terror was released, the TV hasn't any broadcast, the telephones are out of order... A lethal disease is running through his veins...it's a time race... *Fight against an horde of zombies *Search for survivors *Make a plan to escape *Walk through a big city with: a hospital a mall a subway a church a bar and much more! *Reveal the dark secret behind this hell of epic game!

name: Escape the Barn
description:
Oh no! Someone has locked you in the barn - can you escape using only the stuff you find inside? Find your way out in this colorful, childfriendly escape-the-room game.

This game was part of the AGS Bake Sale, where we collected money for Child's Play. If you like the game, why not donate a few bucks to the charity of your choice?

name: Fading Shades
description: Fading Shades is a small 1st person adventure game, set in an unknown location. The only way out is by crossing the rainbow bridge but you can't as long as there are colours missing...

name: Fallen Soldier
description: The story of a soldier of the German Wehrmacht in WWII who falls in battle and laying lifeless surrounded by an ongoing war, he starts questioning what led him here and pondering his role in the grand scheme of things...

name: Fasmo
description: Everyone else has left the colony, you're stuck back to keep an eye on things. What you don't know is that someone else has also stayed back, and he doesn't have such benevolent intentions.

name: Fasmo 2: Fasmo Goes West
description: In this game, you take control of Fasmo, the sentient stick bug from outer space. He's accidentally teleported himself into the wild west, and must contend with ferocious bandits, and scheming policemen. Features two controversial mini-games, and an original score.

name: Featherweight
description: In the fight against the machines, featherweights play a minor role - scouting, recon and spying. Considered as mere data collectors rather than true warriors, they're untrained in combat and ill equipped for any encounters with the enemy. However, when Thadd, a young featherweight, sees a fellow featherweight captured by the enemy and taken to their base, he decides that he will sneak into their compound and help her escape - even if he has to do it all by himself. Using your left mouse button (Walk, interact, select items) and your right mouse button (look, deselect items), guide Thadd in his daring attempt to break his fellow featherweight free!

name: Forever Legend
description: Forever Legend is a freeware role-playing game inspired by Final Fantasy series. A young child from the outside world came into the realm of ordinary people from the huge meteor. The child, named Kilgaly, grows up to become a hero who has to vanquish evil and save his land. Gameplay is divided into overworld traveling and turn-based battles with menu options such as "attack", "magic", "item" and "run". The overworld is viewed from a top-down perspective, which switches to a side view during battles, like in Final Fantasy games.

name: Frank the Farmhand Part 1
description: Frank is a farmhand who tries to find his missing physicsprofessor who's being hunted by some mysterious agents. He'll uncover a truly evil conspiracy and meet some really nasty people in his adventures to save the professor and later on the world itself. NOTE: This game deals with racist themes.

name: Frank the Farmhand Part 2
description:
After having escaped from the agents, Frank and his friends are captured by the american military and brought to a military camp on the island of Guija.

In the second part of Frank's adventures you'll find yourself on an exotic island with lots of new characters to interact with, and many challenging problems to solve.

This game is bigger, better and more beautiful than its predecessor!

name: Pirate Galaxy
description: Pirate Galaxy is a 3D, sci-fi brower-based MMO from Splitscreen Studios and Gamigo with real-time action. The game's story concerns the invading alien Mantis and the fight to stop them.

name: Zero4 Champ
description: The first game in a Japanese drag racing series that contains RPG elements.

name: Thats Life of Ralph
description: This is the life of Ralph, a teenage raccoon, in this story you will experience the most incredible moments of his life. In this relaxing experience, accompany Ralph, his friends, his girlfriend and his family, told in 5 handmade illustrated scenes. Have a calm and relaxing experience.

name: Hot Swap: Cyberlust
description: Time for the Hot Swap series - back with one of the sexiest themes ever to satisfy all your cyber needs! Swap and rotate square blocks in the correct order to solve the puzzle and reveal high quality, realistic, naughty & sexy girls!

name: Crazy Derby Racing
description: Crazy Derby Racing is a destructive race in Low Poly style, get behind the wheel of a Formula 1 car, or a brand new sports car and show what you can do.

name: TechBeat Heart
description: SCORCHING TECHBEAT ACTION! A frantic combo-based score attack shooter with roguelite elements. Make combos to earn more time. Master all weapons and defeat a raving mad machine. 100% arcade action. Online ranking. Lots of achievements. A Dual Gunstrike spin off.

name: Mighty No. 9: Ray Expansion
description: A mysterious robot named RAY has appeared and our hero Beck has been tasked with infiltrating an abandoned lab to search for her. Discover the origins of RAY and join her in her quest for answers.

name: Age of Fear: The Undead King Gold - Pirates! Expansion
description: Pirates! Who doesn't want to be a pirate? Arrrr! Join the epic adventure in which your party joins the crew of the famous Red Beard pirate captain for a treasure hunt! Test your strength versus the dreadful Black Guards and defeat their fearsome leader!

name: Card Battle Spirit Link: Mini Expansion 1
description: 7 new Leader cards arrive in the first expansion for Card Battle Spirit Link! Each leader provides a fresh take on an existing attribute!

name: 2076: Midway Multiverse
description: The multiverse is in danger! Take control of your space combat ship, fight the Nazi Galactic Empire and relive the thrills of classic scrolling shooters in a unique retro Virtual Reality experience.

name: Bridge to Another World: Secrets of the Nutcracker - Collector's Edition
description: Something is terribly wrong in the toy world, and only you can help!

name: Gravity
description: Change the direction of gravity to navigate through packs of levels in this fast-paced, high skill ceiling game! Designed for speed running, this game features a leaderboard, a split timer, and a level editor out of the box.

name: Girls Guns and Zombies
description: Girls Guns & Zombies is exactly that, girls with guns shooting zombies. While, having some poolside fun in between. Scavenge the ruined city overrun by the undead, collect resources and throw a party for the girls!

name: Dininho Adventures: Definitive Edition
description: Help out Dininho in what might be the most heroic adventure of your life! Explore this colorfull and dangerous world, rescuing all the defenseless babies. But be carefull, "He" will be waiting at the end of every road. I trust you! Go and be the Dinoland hero.

name: Lifespawn
description: Lifespawn Is a 2D Platformer With a Twist: You Place Your Own Checkpoints. Good Luck.

name: Experience the Energy: Take the Challenge
description: Play a series of fun minigames to see how your skills align with 10 exciting careers in oil and gas.

name: Pulseball
description: Merging sports with first-person shooters, Pulseball is a fast-paced, competitive multiplayer game. Now with better netcode than Halo Master Chief Collection!

name: Official Wicked Vixen Silicone Scramble
description: Official Wicked Vixen Silicone Scramble is a mini Virtual Reality experience. You've been abducted and find yourself in an alien spacecraft! Your alien captors are about to subject you to an Interstellar IQ test (IIQ). Pass the test and go home. Or don't...

name: B.Y.O.O.L.: Best Years of Our Lives
description: A visual novel about love, full of odd humor, dark humor, meta humor and hopefully, heart. Join Nastya Byool as she goes on a dark, surreal adventure that will change her life forever. This kinetic novel will take you about 40 minutes, making it a good way to pass the time if you're short on it.

name: Heroes of The West
description: Heroes of the West is a community-generated mod for Red Orchestra 2/Rising Storm. It pits US and British forces against German forces in iconic battles on the Western front in WWII. It introduces a new faction, the British Airborne, 4 new maps, 5 new character sets and 10 new weapons.

name: Follia: Dear Father VR
description: Follia: Dear Father VR Engulfing VR experience – immerse yourself completely in the horrors with virtual reality (available for HTC Vive)

name: Tank Guards
description: "Tank Guards" is an independent game of strategy and defense based on tanks. Terrible enemies will invade your base, you have to upgrade your base, arm your tanks, and take advantage of the terrain, with friends to defend against their crazy attack.

name: My Living Things
description: My name is Jeremy. I can bring things to life.

name: Push-Ups Workout
description: Are you ready for the 200 Push-Ups Challenge? Body shaping is always good for our body. These workouts are perfect for men and women, beginners and professionals. Do you want to gain muscles, lose weight, increase strength and stamina? Effective workout plans created by professional fitness coaches will help you to see the results after 1 week! Set a goal for what you want to reach. Don't give up, just follow the training plan. Just simply follow and perform the instructed number of reps, and after 10 weeks, you will be able to do 200 push-ups straight!

name: Love Colors
description: Love Colors is the relaxing paint by numbers pixel art game. Choose from over 150 stylish paintings from lovable themes and become the Picasso of the pixel. Playable solo and up to 4-player couch co-op.

name: Classic Logical Bundle
description: Classic Logical Bundle is a bundle of Beat the Four, The Mines, Reversi Rulez, and Tic'o'Toe. This bundle is sure to bring you back to the yesteryear of gaming. So put your feet up and get ready to experience the classics of gaming, alone or with a friend!

name: Jetman Fly Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Moon Raider and Sweet Witches Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Saint Kotar
description: Saint Kotar is a psychological horror adventure set in an ancient rural town of Croatia. Take on the role of two godly men trying to unravel the terrifying truth behind the town's occult happenings and the disappearance of their relative. Find your humanity -- or descend into madness and death.

name: Lip! Lewd Idol Project Vol. 1
description: Welcome to the world of Lewd Idols! But… What exactly is a Lewd Idol? Join Kairi, the shy aspiring star, and Ranko, her depraved self-proclaimed producer on this lewd journey! Explore Akihabara, form an idol group, and overcome the odds while having lots of girl-on-girl action! Are you ready for it?

name: Touhou Block Fall: Yukari
description: Reimu and Yukari team up in this puzzle game inspired by classic 8-bit Nintendo games. Manage the incoming youkai so Yukari can gap them away!

name: Flavortown
description: Congratulations Rookie! You have been recognized as an elite officer of Flavortown’s Finest. You’ll be paired with Biff and Buddy, two wise cracking meatball “hotshots” of the precinct. With your brothers of the badge as a side, you’ll see how far this criminal underground rabbit hole goes...

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist Arc-V - ARC League Championship
description: Play 2 pre-constructed decks, Prediction Princess Deck and Igknight Deck. Includes additional duels in Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V Campaign and Challenge Mode.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: Waking the Dragons - Yugi’s Journey
description: Play 2 pre-constructed decks, Fang of Critias Deck and Aromage Deck. Includes additional duels in Yu-Gi-Oh! Campaign and Challenge Mode.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: Zexal Dark Mist Saga
description: Play 2 pre-constructed decks, Dark Mist Deck and Evilswarm Deck. Includes additional duels in Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL Campaign and Challenge Mode.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: Arc-V Sora and Dipper
description: Play 2 pre-constructed decks, Fluffal Deck and Constellar Deck. Includes additional duels in Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V Campaign and Challenge Mode.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: 5D's For the Future
description: Play 2 pre-constructed decks, TG Deck and Vylon Deck. Includes additional duels in Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's Campaign and Challenge Mode.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: Arc-V - Shay vs Dennis
description: Play 2 pre-constructed decks, Raidraptor and Performage Deck. Includes additional duels in Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V Campaign and Challenge Mode.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: Waking the Dragons - Joey’s Journey
description: Play 2 pre-constructed decks, Red-Eyes Deck and PSY-Frame Deck. Includes additional duels in Yu-Gi-Oh! Campaign and Challenge Mode.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: Arc-V Yuto v. Sylvio
description: Play 2 pre-constructed decks, Stellarknight Deck and Monarch Deck. Includes additional duels in Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V Campaign and Challenge Mode.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: Arc-V - Yugo’s Synchro Dimension
description: Play 2 pre-constructed decks, Speedroid Deck and Goyo Deck. Includes additional duels in Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V Campaign and Challenge Mode.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: GX Lost Duels
description: Play 2 pre-constructed decks, Masked HERO Deck and Darkness Deck. Includes additional duels in Yu-Gi-Oh! GX Campaign and Challenge Mode.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: Arc-V - Jack Atlas vs Yuya
description: Play 2 pre-constructed decks, Red Dragon Archfiend Deck and Dinomist Deck. Includes additional duels in Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V Campaign and Challenge Mode.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: Arc-V - Declan vs Celina
description: Play 3 pre-constructed decks, D/D/D Deck, Zefra Deck, and Lunalight Deck. Includes additional duels in Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V Campaign and Challenge Mode.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: Arc-V Gong v. Kit
description: Play 2 pre-constructed decks, Superheavy Samurai Deck and X-Saber Deck. Includes additional duels in Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V Campaign and Challenge Mode.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: GX - Leaders
description: Play 2 pre-constructed decks, Toons Deck and Kaiju Deck. Includes additional duels in Yu-Gi-Oh! GX Campaign and Challenge Mode.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: Arc-V Zuzu v. Julia
description: Play 2 pre-constructed decks, Melodious Deck and Gem-Knight Deck. Includes additional duels in Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V Campaign and Challenge Mode.

name: Jixxaw
description: It's jigsaw puzzle time! Put the pieces together to solve the puzzle and reveal high quality, realistic, naughty & sexy girls!

name: Spinning Kid 2
description: Spinning and parkour platformer!

name: Once Upon a Time in the Gold Rush VR: Shoot and Ride
description: This is a sad story of revenge. It happened in the American West in the 1850s. A young cowboy had his wife killed by the gang boss, so he picked up his gun, mounted his horse, and embarked on the road of revenge.

name: Fright Night Sex Fest
description: This is no Hack-n-slash... this is HACK 'N FLASH! Dark and stormy nights are filled with cock-starved, horny frights. Leave your Carnal Fear behind, on this Night of the Giving Head!

name: Endless Battle: Return of Hero +1
description: Help Hero rebuild the entire universe, and beyond! An idle incremental adventure.

name: Murder by Moonlight: Call of the Wolf
description: Play a thrilling Match3 game with a suspenseful crime story. Find clues, search for evidence, and talk to witnesses as you unlock new upgrades to reveal the truth.

name: Succubus Affection
description: In a world of human-like monsters, a young man lives in a quiet, remote village with his sister. However, he is attacked by monsters when he leaves the village. Now he works hard to become stronger so he no longer burdens his sister.

name: Furry Finder: Dating Visual Novel
description: Furry Finder is a visual novel game about finding the love of your life. After turbulent moments in your life, you will have to stand up to your shyness. The main goal of the game is to use a dating app called "Furry Finder" and give Alexis (the main protagonist) a chance to find true love.

name: Minimum Wage: Influence the Election
description: Nail biting mischief. Manipulate the powerful with every decision you make.

name: Rogue Wars
description: Rouge Wars is a great FPS game to play with friends or by yourself. Earn coins by playing to purchase new characters, weapon skins, and better weapons. Play with your friends with either 2,4,6, or 8 players on a team.

name: Helios Rising Heroes
description: Helios Rising Heroes is a new strategic RPG mobile game, developed in collaboration by Happy Elements of the hit mobile game Ensemble Stars! fame and Cacalia Studios.

name: Diamond Hands: To the Moon
description: A game with one objective - to get to the moon. A game for apes by apes. A game as frustrating as stock market manipulation, a game that will make you want to hold on for dear life...

name: Rat Prison
description: Rat Prison - pixel 2D simulator with horror elements.

name: The Beast Awoke to Eat Your Darlings
description: BATEYD is a horror game mixing puzzle and action mechanics. Outwit the Beast who haunts your nights, and save as many of your darlings as you can. Each nightmare is a puzzle you can solve in a myriad of different ways. The better you do, the more you discover about a past you've long forgotten.

name: Kavel
description: Drag Tetromino blocks onto a board of gems to make a match. Use bombs for impressive explosive effects. Kavel is an action-puzzle game that brings together block puzzles and match-3 in an exciting new twist. A truly unique new entry in the genre.

name: Kraken Smash: Volleyball
description: Squids play volleyball! Smash the ball in your friend's face and start a fight with them that will last at least for the 10 generations to come. You can play with up to 4 players, which means you can lose 3 friends at the same time.

name: Being Centered
description: Balance your chakras.

name: Pandemia: Virus Outbreak
description: Swipe cards to face the deadly virus threat in this story driven strategy game. Step into the world in which you will face the decisions that world leaders make in the event of a deadly virus threat. Every decision have consequences.

name: SkunkHunter 101
description: 2020 port of the 2009 title. Grow and sell weed.

name: Equaline
description: Equaline is a "one-stroke calculation puzzle" where you have to connect numbers and symbols with lines to complete a calculation. There is only one correct answer for each combination of nine squares, and the target number increases with each puzzle. It's a highly competitive action puzzle game.

name: Different Stories VR
description: With hearing and sight! Discover the secrets of the beautiful lands. Look for differences, solve puzzles, perform various activities such as cleaning :) Find the differences and learn all the stories!

name: Tears of Luna
description: Danmaku style STG. What is The cause of the Emergency? Why the artifact finally appeared? Travel through time and space,dodge the bullet-hell, defeat the sorceress, and save your own world line!

name: Spacebug
description: Embark on an interplanetary journey in this space shooter game with many levels to pass or a Sandbox mode to break your record each time you play!

name: It's Harvest Time!
description: It's Harvest time is a simple 2d puzzle casual game. Be the simple farmer at a farmstead on the countryside. Build and upgrade the farm. Protect the farm animals from wild animals.

name: Color Pixel Heroes
description: Color Pixel Heroes is an addictive anti-stress pixel art game. Choose from a variety of fun pixel images and follow the numbers to bring them to life. Pixel Coloring has never been this easy!

name: A Cure for Jessica
description: An emotional story-driven game, where you play as Dr. Olivia, a scientist trying to find a way to cure her daughter. Explore the world and save Jessica from this deadly virus, as you recall some memories.

name: Uncle Nook's Monster Emporium
description: Explore your way through a procedurally generated haunted mansion. Watch out for monsters and deadly traps that block your way. Only with creativity and persistence will you make it out alive!

name: Spacelandia
description: Enter the world of Spacelandia and learn about the universe through engaging adventure stories.

name: Apsis Online
description: Apsis Online is a minimalist multi-user roguelike (MUR) in which you play a Voyager. A human, mentally and physically augmented for a new life in deep space.

name: RagDoll MadDoll
description: RagDoll MadDoll is an arcade based ragdoll dropping game with 8 levels, unique art direction and diverse score outcomes.

name: Heliopolis Six
description: In Heliopolis Six you construct and manage your own space station. Join station parts together in 3D, extend them with modules, collect and distribute resources and ensure live support. As station director, good management is the most important aspect of your job, since space is a dangerous place.

name: Ruin
description: Hung Moose Studios & Red Mouse Games have joined forces! Creating a unique game full of destruction, exploration, despair and lore! The world is going to end... But HOW is the question. And will YOU be prepared to survive the Ruin that has been wrought upon the world? One way to find out!

name: Inn Legend
description: Sin descripción

name: Present Danger
description: It's only a matter of time. Use your agility and trusty pistol to survive as long as you can against an onslaught of corrupted holiday paraphernalia.

name: Hell Blasters
description: Hell Blasters is a bullet hell shoot 'em up where you can blast the bullet hell away!

name: The Darkest Island
description: You are the only survivor of a plane crash. You are on a mysterious island and must face surprises and fight to stay alive. Lose yourself on an incredible journey of survival. Can you find a solution and leave the island?

name: Chronicles of Ash
description: Chronicles of Ash is a turn based, management, simulation game set in the fantasy world of Askara where you take the role of a retired veteran hero that decided to open an adventuring guild to train the next generation of heroes.

name: DF-41 Simulator
description: 3D visualizer and simulator of the Dongfeng-41 (DF-41 东风-41) road-mobile intercontinental ballistic missile.

name: Bubble Bubble Ball
description: A boring little ball is wondering in space while it meets those lovely colorful bubble A place is big enough to kill time A giant stage filled with endless and all forms of bubble Various tricks will lead to different paths Dangerous space will strangle the live out of your balls

name: Our Hero! Two
description: Play in the shoes of 3 different heroes, each one with their skills and peculiarities, to pave your way through this new story of the funniest Hack and Slash of the world!

name: Silk Roads: Caravan Kings
description: In Silk Roads: Caravan Kings you follow in the footsteps of the legendary Marco Polo on a journey into Cathay in search of riches and adventure.

name: Moirs
description: Moirs is a 7 Keys rhythm game, step into the world of music and enjoy the journey!

name: Christmas Elf
description: Christmas Elf will help you to fully decorate your Windows desktop for Christmas. The app offers many ways to decorate for the holidays, including lights and garlands, different types of snow, Christmas trees, festive tunes, and beautiful wallpapers.

name: Briddle
description: A wonderful riddle game, where you need to solve 25 riddles with just a few hints. Can you reach level 25? I will be waiting for you there. You will receive some hints for each riddle, and then, is up to you to find the right answer. The difficulty will grow each level, can you reach the end?

name: Smackball
description: Smackball is what you get when you fuse tennis, squash and air-hockey into a competitive video game. Play in fast-paced 1v1 matches against your friends or the AI. Smack your way to victory!

name: Tiki Tiki: The Tropical Memory Game
description: Tiki Tiki: The Tropical Memory Game is a family friendly memory game where all can improve their memory, speed of thinking. With 3 game modes and 3 difficulties its the perfect way to train your brain.

name: Tear and the Library of Labyrinths
description: The twin sisters Tear and Lumiere enjoy a happy life running their clinic. But when a demon abducts her sister, Tear must summon her courage to venture through worlds within magical tomes to bring her sister home safe.

name: Alien World Millionaire
description: This is a chess game for strategic players. Players can buy real estate by rolling dice, play small games or go to the counting road to get tickets, buy cards and become their own winning secret. Use tactics to defeat other players, and finally become a millionaire in the different world.

name: Mine Dungeon 2: Rurumu's trip
description: We’re back with cute girls and minesweeping! A minesweeper action adventure with enemies and obstacles to conquer! Our latest edition includes a hit point (HP) system and mine detection flares to support you. With a myriad of new enemy types and boss encounters, an exciting new adventure awaits!

name: Caroline's Abyss
description: Caroline's Abyss is a 2D platform game with challenging levels in a dark and mysterious world. In this place, Caroline will find her greatest adversities and will have to overcome them.

name: Milf City
description: Milf City is a modern city where many races, cultures and lives of ordinary people are intertwined. And today you will be able to get to know more closely the life of 5 beautiful girls, residents of this city, who are radically different in their lifestyles and characters.

name: Bloodland
description: Bloodland is an online multiplayer combat game, based around magic and spell-casting. Join a team, play as different roles, and customize your character's attributes lead your team to victory. Battle across different landscapes in online matchmaking.

name: Jumping Frog
description: Jumping Frog is a game in which a prince turned into a frog climbs a tower to return to human life. Enjoy the rugged adventure of returning to human life right now!

name: Hollow Mind: The Lost Puppy
description: A small puppy will have to fight with their fears and find all the positive memories, personified by soft toys, in completely different locations. Beautiful graphics, pleasant sounds, and interesting performance. Just relax and feel the atmosphere of adventure.

name: Imperium BCE
description: Imperium BCE is a real-time 3D strategy game in which you can build cities, control armies, use both spies and diplomats to achieve different political goals, make technological discoveries, trade, and sign laws. The game is all about making the right choices, at the right time.

name: Two by One
description: Do you have what it takes to beat two games at the same time? Prove your skills by controlling two ships simultaneously or join forces with a friend to overcome the challenge of this stylish Shoot'Em Up.

name: WWR: World of Warfare Robots
description: Join robot war games. Walking war robots battle games for free. Download now!

name: The Pacifist's Great and Final Nightmare
description: The Pacifist's Great and Final Nightmare is a first-person three-dimensional game with platformer and horror styles of gameplay. The gameplay of this game involves navigating through levels to avoid dangers, solve puzzles, and reach the level exit.

name: Perfect Tides
description: Perfect Tides is a point and click adventure game about the agony and anticipation of being a teen. Set in the year 2000, you play as Mara, an internet-obsessed young writer who lives on a so-called island paradise. Following 4 seasons of the year, you experience through Mara the beauty and silence of the island, the turmoil of family life and mainland public school, and an ever-evolving quest for love, friendship and experience.

name: Mac Biskwi Adventures
description: Play as Mac Biskwi in this cute little 2D platformer and help him to bring peace to his kingdom! Be prepared for a really fun game to play, cool effects, amazing musics and awesome levels!

name: Meat Lead Fire
description: Annihilate hordes of monster bugs in last stand endless tower defence, deaths is with every second, yours or them.

name: Eco Hole
description: Eco Hole is a survival game for one or two players with unique gameplay. Strange events began to happen in the world, and people began to turn into monsters. You are mysterious heroes who suddenly appeared at the right moment, and you strive to stop the nightmare at any cost.

name: Cryptid Crew
description: Cryptid Crew is a visual novel and dating sim. Play as a freshly-bitten werewolf and go on a road trip across the US. Meet various cryptids and monsters, befriend them, and then, if you want, date them! (And yes, that includes Mothman.)

name: Beach Volleyball Competition
description: Beach volleyball fun game. x2 game modes, 3D or 2.5D isometric projection. Easy game play controls. Realistic ball physics and speed. Several levels, with several music. Story mode have progress for increasing team skills. Match mode vs AI of other real users. Also can be available for mobile

name: Her Lie I Tried to Believe: Extended Edition
description: Her Lie I Tried To Believe follows the unhealthy relationship of a man and a woman who, through a series of fateful encounters, become deeply entangled with one another all the while still being haunted by their pasts.

name: Boom Face
description: A first-person-shooter with a high score tracker for singleplayer as well as online / spllit-screen multiplayer. Shoot your friends in the face!

name: Space Runner: Anime
description: Become the legendary Warior in the Space. Play single-player across large exotic maps. Think tactical, be quick against the time and enjoy the adventure!

name: Random Raiders
description: Random Raiders puts you in charge of a newly-started raiding guild in the fictional MMORPG 'World of Guild Quest'. Recruit the best players you can find - balance their classes, volatile personalities and overcome the inevitable drama in order to become the best guild on the server.

name: Consternation II
description: After an unfortunate accident at Sorley Paper Mill, the facility was abandoned and left to rot. Multiple urban explorers venture into the facility, never to be heard from again. Police eventually walled off the mill in order to keep trespassers out... Or to keep something in...

name: Hvor: Confrontation
description: This is a third-person survival horror game where you play as a police officer in a hostile world plagued by an unknown disease. Try to survive, destroy enemies, and remember: every misstep could be your last.

name: Steady
description: A deceptively simple movement game that will challenge you through a set of 50 unique levels. Dodge moving obstacles, cannon balls, and spinning contraptions to see how far you can go.

name: The Kalalau Trail
description: A first-person 3D version of the famous Kalalau Trail on the Hawaiian island of Kauai. Vast open world includes the full length of the trail. Many surprises and easter eggs, many famous sights along the trail.

name: Cyberpunica 2.0.2.0
description: Cyberpunica 2.0.2.0 is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls. The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Cyber Drive
description: Cyberdrive is: Waves of enemies constantly attacking without giving you a break Average lifespan at easy difficulty 1 minute. Only one thing is required of you "KILL YOUR ENEMIES !!!!!"

name: Starship Turd Nugget: Too Cool For Stool
description: A retro-arcade-inspired space shooter with tongue-in-cheek humor, a focus on exhilarating powerups, massive scores, and leaderboard climbing.

name: Relash
description: Relash is a puzzle action game developed by a Japanese indie game studio. In this Sci-Fi world fallen boxes rise up to their original position and broken windows can be restored to their original state. You need a completely new mindset to clear these puzzles. Solve increasingly difficult puzzles in a world where all actions and phenomena are reversed and conventional problem solving can't be applied.

name: Skybinder
description: Skybinder is a creative puzzle. Enjoy thinking spatially, playfully, and meditatively as you bind dots into shapes.

name: Inside Soccer
description: An indoor soccer/football game played by robots driven by you the player

name: Flatworld
description: Explore a world full of magic, puzzles and enemies in which the main character is the weakest.

name: Attack on Titan: Episode 1
description: Three new episodes "A Soldier's Duty", "An Upright Person" and "Earning the Wings" will be added to your Survey Mission.

name: Gun Master
description: Gun Master is an independent game of strategic shooting type.There are many game levels, and it has a wealth of firearms.

name: Wacky Wizarding Dungeon
description: Plunge into a dungeon filled with horrible rats, relics from the past, and a Bug person who has an affinity for actual feces, utilize mighty weapons and upgrades to help yourself to stand a fighting chance.

name: BlasterBeat
description: Blasterbeat is a game that combines the mechanics of a third-person session shooter and rhythm game. Battles take place in music arenas for up to 8 players.

name: Gravity Well
description: Save stranded astronaut, don't let him crash to the planet surface or suffocate in endless space! Fun and brain-teasing puzzle game will challenge you with lots of levels from easy to super tricky problems for you to solve.

name: Sink

name: Luminus
description: A 2D puzzle platformer where you use light and shadow to manipulate the world.

name: Hexonex
description: A casual hex-based puzzle game. Match tiles by color across 108 puzzles, and beat your high scores to unlock new color schemes and music to customize your experience!

name: Morte
description: Sin descripción

name: Cutie Bear

name: The Wednesday
description: It is a serious game that traverses time to fulfill the wish of a lifetime.Immerse yourself in a world of 3D graphics and embark on a journey to change the past and save the future by finding hidden clues on the island of death.

name: DoxyLanD
description: The only roguelike-rpg-quest-driven with multiple endings that you will play!

name: Paint Girl
description: Take you easy to make a two-dimensional beauty girl, the mode is easy and interesting, from line drawing to coloring, the whole painting process experience, you don't need painting experience to make your wife live~

name: DeRailed

This game is a First Person Shooter in the Adventure/Horror genre

name: Mixx Island
description: Mixx Island is a one small hold & Gun, boss Rush mini-game of Casual difficulty.

name: Elon's Dream 2
description: A new part of the indie platformer with a side view once again challenges players, this time you will have to cope with a naughty jetpack in conditions of limited visibility, avoid collisions with meteors and spatial holes, and all this, as always, in conditions of limited fuel reserves.

name: Toilet Paper Unleashed
description: Toilet Paper Unleashed is the ultimate toilet paper game - avoid menacing shopping carts and find all 8 rolls of golden toilet paper in each level to background music.

name: 100 Hidden Cupcakes
description: Hidden object game in the setting of a cartoon cafe. Black and white hand-drawn graphics. This is a kind game for kids.

name: Treasures of the Roman Empire
description: Altruistic and playful idler, this is what you have been told since childhood. Charmed by treasures but willing to help others, you will have to help ancient romans dealing with their jobs, their problems and their joys.

name: 100 Worlds: Escape Room Game
description: Join Mia on an exciting adventure! Help her escape from inside of the magic book by solving brain-teasing logic puzzles. Explore beautiful fantasy worlds filled with spells, unearthly creatures and magic.

name: 1000 Shards
description: 1000 Shards is a game in which you control a spaceship. Your main task is to collect bright white shards and avoid obstacle blocks. Use the ship's maneuverability and your reaction to last longer. How many shards will you collect?

name: 100 Rub: Operation Global Denomination
description: In 100 Rub: Operation Global Denomination you set out to get your money back from the government after they claimed it after a financial crisis.

name: Stories of Submission: Learn Your Place
description: A BDSM-themed erotic visual novel about a young man trying to find a purpose in life. When he becomes drawn to a cruel Mistress, will she bring him joy or suffering? Is there even a difference?

name: Statik
description: Statik is a 4 player online co-op horror game. A group of kids in the 1980's find an abandoned house with a shelf full of VHS tapes. When each tape is played, the events of the movie start to play out in real life. Will you escape with your lives or become another victim of the static.

name: Suhoshin
description: Suhoshin is a 2D Visual Novel taking place during medieval Korea. While investigating mysterious murders, you will have to make interactive choices that will lead you to different paths and endings.

name: Pretty Girls Panic! Plus
description: Popular Arcade Game "Pretty Girls Panic!" is back with more power. Expand the area steadily and dodge enemy attacks and avoid capture. There are 40 stages in total. Conquer all stages and Complete the rescue of these Pretty Girls.

name: Zup! 5: DLC

name: Zup! 3: DLC
description: A DLC of Zup! 3 that brings 11 new levels to enjoy!

name: Zup! 4: DLC
description: A DLC of Zup! 4 that brings new cubes and 11 new levels to enjoy!

name: Zup! 2: DLC
description: A DLC of Zup! 2 that brings new cubes and 11 new levels to enjoy!

name: Zup!: DLC
description: A DLC of Zup! that brings new cubes and 22 new levels to enjoy!

Assemble your forces, out plan, and outfight your enemies to master the art of combined arms warfare in chaotic simultaneous turns where commanders must adapt quickly to an evolving battlefield.

He cannot even walk due to the slimy texture, but is able to kick the wall and slip with taking advantage of the lubricant! Let's cut off Ninjas' heads one after another, and escape from the Castle!

name: Eat Fish 3D
description: A 3D leisure game with the same playing method as the classic game big fish eating small fish, but it has a much richer fish population. Because it is a 3D game, the manipulation is more challenging.

name: SimplePlanes VR
description:
Strap a VR headset on your face and fly fighter jets, bombers, helicopters, WW2 planes, civilian planes, race cars, monster trucks, tanks, and pretty much anything else you can think of. There are over half a million crafts available to download for free.

SimplePlanes VR is a flight sim with an ever-expanding collection of aircraft to download and fly for free. Airplanes, helicopters, cars, boats, and more are available and new crafts are added every day.

name: Stay Alive on the Tank: Explosive Shells in the Darkness
description: Video game about tank battles. Fight against opponents in multiplayer or in career mode. Earn points and upgrade your tank. Unlock new levels to complete together in cooperative mode.

name: Island Herders
description: A sliding block puzzle where you must herd creatures along floating islands. Complete challenging puzzles with 1-10 targets to maneuver.

name: Gjallarhorn
description: Two years following the Second Great War, the Osirian Empire wrestles with finding a new ruler. While each faction sees a different future for their people, decisions are made by strength, not through ideals, and only the dead have seen the end of war.

name: Soul Catcher
description: A Low res horror game 14 years in the making, Soul Catcher has the player take the role of one of six characters who find themselves in a nightmarish remote mountainside trying to save a loved one from a demon worshiping cult. Navigate the mansion, solve the puzzles and evade the horrors that lurk.

name: Finger Guessing King
description: A kind of leisure competitive game similar to guessing boxing, which has the element of luck and tests the wisdom and strategy of players.

name: Renova
description: Renova is a tactical ARPG that promises a novel journey in gameplay and its diverse world. A refreshing take on the genre, Renova presents you tactical combat system, robust multiplayer game mode, and nostalgic fantasy aesthetic.

name: Mira's Workshop
description: Learn how to make a masterpiece from scrap materials! Mira's Workshop - Uncover hidden pictures!

name: Mr. Parkour 2
description: Mr. Parkour 2 is not a game for the faint of heart! In this 2D parkour platformer you have to jump over precipices, circular saws and traps on the way to the cherished crystal.

name: VR Pirates of the Caribbean Life Experience
description: This is a VR tour game with the theme of pirate culture. Players can travel through the three scenes of the pirate ship, the pirate bedroom and the underwater ruins.

name: Monster Killer
description: A roguelike with weapons craft, monsters and magic Dungeon of evil Bounty Hunter

name: Burst Squad
description: Burst Squad. online multiplayer fps game. earn points by killing enemies. be the best you!

name: T^2.5
description: It is just simple T-T-T on 3D cube.

name: Lifeguard Simulator

name: Synthwave Burnout
description: The lost highway awaits you to take you beyond the horizon. Relax and let the sounds of synthwave open the way into the realm of neon - a world of revived imagination and fantasy, more real than reality itself.

name: Superstorm Melon Date

description: Neon: Eternal is a 2D Retro-styled Arena shooter. Blast your way through seamlessly never-ending action-packed levels of radiating colors while eliminating over 50 unique enemies!

name: SCP: Undeads Winter's
description: Undeads Winter's is a fps zombies shooter with a short story based on "o5 ordinary man" using "scp 108".

name: Atelier Tia
description: Atelier Tia is an 2D adult-only game with action beat'em up. Tia, alchemist girl fight against many of enemies and bosses. Beat all of them and punish them in sexy way.

name: Text RPG
description: Turn-based text RPG roguelite where you choose 1 out of 3 classes to conquer the dungeon and smash the enemies

name: Dangerous Zone
description: Dangerous zone - a game where you need to survive passing dangerous levels, where different traps are waiting for you, in the form of mines, broken geysers, evil enemies…

name: Simply Parkour
description: Simply Parkour is built of upon a Beautiful Simplistic World of Platforming Areas for Endless Running & Unique Movement for First Person Parkour. Titled Simply Parkour. Don't fall off or you will have to start over again, stay on rooftops and traverse through puzzles to beat the game.

name: Fencing
description: [Fencing] is an unconventional game. Players only use four keys to control the character fight, there will be many unexpected situations in the fight, for example, the character is suddenly hit to fly, or the character suddenly cramps!!!

name: Green World: Catharsis

name: Evade Zero
description: Evade is a fast and intense local multiplayer game. Go head to head with 2 - 4 friends or family and test your skills in the original competitive action game.

name: The Holy Silence
description: A Roguelike action adventure shoot game that creates your legendary experience. In the dark and wide world, explore the five races and the causes of the world's cataclysm. Flexible to deal with the complex and changing world environment with different weapons, technology and elements.

name: The Last Place
description: The end of the world is coming!

name: Pizza Apocalypse
description: Pizza Apocalypse is a pint-sized, turn-based tactics game where you attempt to deliver pizzas, meet quirky characters, and hopefully don’t get disembowelled by cosmic horrors along the way! With a heavy focus on unique abilities and customisation.

name: Dinobag's Arcade
description: Welcome to Dinobag's Arcade, a fun place for children of all ages to have fun and play with our mascots Kevin, Madelyn, Liam, Catherine, and our star Daniel Dinobag. Unfortunately, all our electronics keep breaking. We need you to come in, fix them, and of course, enjoy the show.

name: Furry Woof and Nya

name: The Lord of the Parties

name: Token Game

name: Mushroom Challenge
description: A mushroom hunter simulator. Here you can walk around the forest and enjoy the nature, meet different animals and, of course, gather mushrooms.

name: Trinity Archetype
description: Trinity Archetype is a roguelite, turn-based RPG where you fight deadly enemies trying to take over your broken world. Analyze upcoming actions and plan your own; Use the unique Skill Boost and Party Inspire mechanics to get the upper hand in battle.

name: The World's Hardest Game 3D
description: Easy to play, very hard to finish. The World's Hardest Game, which you used to play on flash game sites, is now with you in 3D. Good luck in this challenging game of 30 unique levels!

description: CTRL Phreak is an over-the-top hacking sim. Become a LEET H4X0R as you download RAM, fight elite hacker bosses, and "code" by literally mashing your keyboard. Welcome to the Deep Web, kiddo.

name: BoatMan
description: BoatMan is a 3-person runner with a top view in which you have to control a kayak that rushes through a stormy mountain river at breakneck speed! Dodge obstacles and pick up bonuses that will help you set a record and show all your friends that you are the number one in any river expanses!

name: Galaxy's Extreme
description: Frenetic spaceship racing game, inspired by the high speed racing games of the 90s.

name: FBG Arcade Machine
description: 2 elegant arcade games in 1 package! Set your high score - raising the stakes on your friend, and the whole world. "Run and Gun" will have you blasting ghosts and collecting coins in this fast-paced endless shooter. Try "Rock and Stone" a thrilling 3-D Asteroid defence! What will your high score be?

name: 12 Labours of Hercules XI: Painted Adventure

name: Ninja Kunoichi

Your memory is erased, you almost do not remember anything. Explore the mansion and try to shed light on the secrets of your past. But be careful with its inhabitants.

name: Emotion
