name: Mind Over Melee Radio
description: Dank Tunes, Dank Memes and everything in-between. Play a stupid game, win stupid rewards. Fill the void in your life with some simple numerical validation for the glorious cause of the Infinite Grind.

name: Summer in Trigue
description: Summer in Trigue is a yuri only dating sim set in the mysterious island of Trigue

name: The Witch Eye
description: The Witch Eye is an indie psychological horror game . As a local hunter vicky explore valley of majuli village and try to survive long enough to discover the terrible secrets of the witch "nale ba"

name: Kolo
description: Kolo is a medieval settlement simulator where you lead a group of adventurers ready to start a new life in the wilderness.

name: Macro golf
description: Macro golf is a game consisting of courses which each have 8 holes. With each hole, you need to hit the ball through it so that it sinks in the hole. You need to navigate the ball around the course, to sink it in the hole to move onto the next one. This game also includes local multiplayer.

description: The Sin Collector: Repentless is a game on the border of a visual novel and a classic text RPG, set in the world of The Sin Collector. Action takes place a couple of years before the events presented in the books.

name: Rifle Dodger
description: Rifle Dodger is a VR arcade style shooter, with a focus on intuitive weapon handling and control. Fight through waves of flying targets with your trusty bolt action rifle, but stay on your toes as the targets shoot back!

name: Cats and Food 4: New Year
description: Cats and Food 4: New Year is a 2D precision platformer for cat lovers everywhere. It's time to play the perfect game for the new year! The cute little kitten is hungry. Help him jump to overcome all obstacles and collect the maximum amount of delicious food.

description: This is the story of a kid name Jorah and his adventures throughout the beautiful pixel art towns. It has been foretold that anybody who does good deeds will be granted access to the Village of Gods. Fulfill Jorah's quest by visiting beautiful pixel art towns like Christmas,Snowtown,Waterworld etc.

description: The girl of your dreams could be anywhere. Basking under the rays of sun at the nearest park, strolling across the busy city the streets, enjoying a pleasant noon at your local book shop or coffee shop, and splashing in the warm waters of the nearest beach.

description: Ludo King is a cross platform multiplayer game that supports Desktop, Android, iOS and Windows mobile platform at same time. This game also support offline mode, where player can play with Computer or, Local multiplayer (pass and play mode).

name: Neko Hacker Plus

name: Attack on Titan: Episode 2

name: Attack on Titan: Episode 3
description: Three new episodes "A Brilliant Scheme", "Elite" and "Struggle to Survive" will be added to your Survey Mission.

name: TC Strikers 3
description: Who are you fighting for? My usual job turns into a big mission. An easy-to-understand system reminiscent of the old barrage STG. Pave the way with powerful PowerShots!

description: You are a military man who was sent on an assignment to investigate in a dark forest due to the frequent disappearance of people. After spending a little time, you realize that ancient prisoners are being revived in this forest, and the longer you are in it, the more and more of them.

name: Random Platformer

name: Aim Master H

name: Fill and Cross Christmas Riddles
description: The most magical night of the year. It's coming... RIGHT NOW! 120 new levels in Christmas Griddlers!

name: MegaRamp
description: In this game you have to position the game elements in a exact way to get the ball from the top of a ramp inside a basket on its botton. The game uses real world physics on the ball movement and all your sense of localization will be demanded to complete the challenges.

name: Letter Match / Spell N Score / Crosswords
description: Sin descripción

name: Larcin Lazer
description: The best tool for a good theft? Your memory! Observe your surroundings and remember the location of the lasers, they disappear as soon as you move. Move with style to dodge the many obstacles spread across more than 100 levels. Prepare for a memorable heist

description: As an artificially created being with unlimited potential, explore the foundations and extensions of existence! Find friends and companions on this way, but take good care of them, because lives are fragile. Hyparxis is a turn-based, classic JRPG with unlimited character development.

In 2320, a huge monster appeared on the earth.Only magic energy can do harm to the monster.However,there is no more magic energy left on earth. So,you need to gain the energy from magical girls and save your world.

name: Leave!
description: This is a Horror Adventure game that takes VR movement and lets you move around as you please and it takes the horror aspect in that you will always be curious and worried about where you might get scared next.

name: RPG Idle
description: RPG Idle is an IDLE game with inspiration from most RPGS... In this game you will be controlling Clovis, a brave Knight in search of training.

name: Rescue Rina
description: Rescue Rina is a 2D Top-Down Sci-Fi themed adventure game based on the story of Rina, a young girl, who got kidnapped by the Evil scientists of Magix Group, whose purpose was to channel her emotions into a Heart-shaped crystal to give life to Robots.

name: TV Empire Tycoon
description: Sin descripción

name: The Well
description: The Well is a compact (avg. play time 20 mins) one-button horror game based off of a poem by HP Lovecraft.

name: GeneRacing
description: Ein Top-Down Arcade Racing Game - with TrackEditor, League System, Steamintegration, Controllersupport, etc.

name: Rocky Ride
description: Welcome to the "Rocky Ride" arcade race! The "Rocky Ride" game is unpredictable tracks, crazy speeds and dangerous rivals. Upgrade your buggy car, choose any of a huge number of different tracks, and - go! To the prize places!

name: Generation Nova
description: Manage a colony of people who woke too soon from their cryo-sleep. Build and manage a working generation ship and hopefully one day the grandchildren of the first generation might land on a habitable planet.

name: Age of Jura
description: The Jurassic RTS dinosaur game. Prepare for an extinction in a long forgotten age, the Age of Jura, where humans are still living among dinosaurs. Take the human race to the top of the food chain. It's now or never: Kill or be killed.

name: City of Robots
description: Play as a super advanced AI- take control over the city of robots and expand your futuristic metropolis. Build your dream city and be the heart and brain of it. Craft technology and equipment for humankind or prepare for war against them.

name: TC Strikers 1
description: The first game in the TC Strikers series. The simple controls make it fun for everyone.

name: Becloudead
description: Becloudead is a post-apocalyptic sci-fi hack and slash cinematic platformer. Unravel the dark truth behind the zombie apocalypse as you venture deep into the bloody and gruesome narrative of Becloudead.

name: The Indestructible Moxy Boxy
description: Heal and reload by inhaling defeated enemies in this precision, twin-stick shooter. Solve action-oriented puzzles and explore an adorably violent world, in a thoughtful story - told through shoebox dioramas.

name: Cyan

name: Ingredienta
description: Discovering, brewing and perfecting powerful elixirs, mixtures and droughts. Exploring unique, randomly-generated fantasy lands. Overcoming obstacles and dangers using various potions and gathering ingredients for stronger ones. Welcome to Ingredienta!

name: Fear of The Unknown
description: Fear of The Unknown - Chapter One is a fear inducing horror game allowing players to dive into a long forgotten stream of memories that recalls victims of the dark figure that lurks around you. Will one's soul have the strength required to survive the inevitable...!?

name: Cybermere
description: Cybermere is a sci-fi hacking game. Use warez to penetrate ICE, mine for password fragments and break into database of various companies. You play as Lance, a novice hacker in 2033.

name: Godo
description: 《Godo》 is a puzzle game that explores adventure, Work hard to find pieces of information and solve the final puzzle

name: Annual Intruders
description: A home invasion horror game about participating in an annual challenge.

name: Robot Invasion
description: Robot Invasion is a game set in the near future when robots have invaded Earth. There are robots everywhere and they are deadly. Avoid them at all costs.

name: Gothic Girls
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: NKCell
description: NKCell is a VR game where you are a genetically modified natural killer cell that slash viruses and bacteria to keep your host's infection level at low rates.

description: The girls of Bikini Island are eager to fulfill your wildest fantasies. All you have to do is survive the island. Battle your way through the treacherous environment, man-eating tigers, and savage natives to save the girls and unlock their unique pleasuring powers.

name: 20b
description: Eight peculiar students, a pair of highly-trained assassins, extraterrestrials plotting a full-scale invasion of Earth, a secret society on the verge of toppling the US presidency and a Doomsday cult gearing to wipe California off the map.

name: General Population
description: Experience the brutality of prison life in this first-person RPG. Survive as an inmate amidst the violence and politics of the penal system or enforce the rules as a corrections officer. Tattoo and craft, or bribe and murder your way to the top. But remember, your reputation is everything.

name: Finger Breaker
description: Can you hold down 2 or 3 buttons at the same time, easily ? And what about 5, 8, 11, even with a time limit. Try it in this simple game.

name: Toxa
description: ToxΔ adapts the action, adventure and unique genre. Equipped with magic warfare, teleportation, forest, sci-fi city and sea. On the same Maps, there are 2 graphic modes, namely soft and natural.

name: Cleanup Crew
description: Cleanup Crew is a multiplayer physics-based arena game inspired by the classics. Gather your friends and prepare to battle it out in the fight of your lives! Up to 4 online players, the last standing vacuum wins.

name: Click Quest 3D
description: Click Quest 3D is an indie erotic clicker, with 5 beautiful naked girls in different poses. With awesome 3D animation, this is a must play!

name: Tap-Tap Adventure
description: So what do we have here? Another masterpiece of game development? -It is interesting, but I do not pretend. Unique features? -Sure! Will not even lag on the calculator! Is it difficult? -It is said that only the bravest will bring sound to the world of Tap-tap. Perhaps you will succeed?

name: Determinant
description: Post-apocalyptic physics-based open-world survival adventure game. Planned to include combat, base building, crafting, puzzles, survival and a compelling story to drive it. Building will be a core gameplay mechanic where you build structures to overcome challenges and solve puzzles in the world.

name: Mirrored Pawns
description: Mirrored Pawns is a relaxing puzzle game that will challenge your spatial reasoning. Your goal is to successfully navigate 2 pawns across a chess-like board to the goal positions by working with the axes of symmetry provided to you.

name: Urizen Frosty Plus the New Warriors
description: Stretch across lands of unforeseeable cold, and trouble in Urizen Shadows of the Cold Deluxe Frosty Edition which includes a massive 54 warrior, 69 stage "head bopping", sword slashing lineup with characters raging from beasts, ogres, ninjas, knights, aliens, sorcerers, mermaids and demons.

name: Comet Crusher: Block Breaker
description: While exploring deep space, you have come across our solar system. It is up to you to crush each layer of every planet in our solar system in this beautiful block breaker. See if you can complete each set of levels corresponding to each planet in order to unlock the next.

name: Cyberpunk Messenger
description: Drive your vehicle as fast as you can through a cyberpunk city. Deliver packages from normal stores or earn some extra money by transporting suspicious stuff. Be the fastest in a neighborhood or lose your job. No one will cry for you in this tough world. Try yourself!

name: The Crafter's Defense
description: An active strategy game where you customize your dungeon and defend against waves of invaders. Create your dungeon, place monsters and traps, and protect your core! Take direct control of any of your dungeon's monsters to directly engage in the combat or sit back watch the battle unfold.

name: The Day They Came
description: The game is set in current time, survive, craft, build, 5ppl coop.

name: Mr. Magic
description: Mr. Magic is an awesome, third-person, action-adventure game where you become a superhero. Unlock powerful skills by visiting secret places around the globe to retrieve mystical skills before they fall into the wrong hands. Master extraordinary abilities with mystical secrets!

name: Car Constructor
description: Car Constructor will allow you to build, repair and paint your own car, then check it out on the race track!

name: Waifu Secret
description: Exciting, puzzle game with fancy girls. Control yourtube and find the way to pass the level and unlock a lot of beauty in the gallery. Gameplay is beautiful and relaxing.

name: Space Castle
description: Space Strategy. A mix of tower hold games and role-playing action.

name: The Kingdom of Galanor
description: A wandering hero, you find yourself in the Kingdom Of Galanor where you will need to use all of your skills to survive the numerous quests you will undertake and the danger you will face.

name: Soarocity
description: An exciting 2d platformer with a painterly art style and unique rotation mechanic.

name: Crazy Mafioso
description: Crazy Mafioso is a addicting multi-level survival game. Don`t let yourself be killed! Upgrade your barricades, weapons and gun power. Kill and earn game money.

name: GhostCast
description: This Multiplier FPS is Fast paced, you will die but won't be dead, you will be a ghost but you can be human again.

name: Kolobok: The Return
description: A preachy game based on a Russian fairy tale.

name: Save Aisha
description: Help Emran rescue his daughter (Aisha) who has been taken from his arms. You will join him in his journey through the castles and forests to meet the king.

name: Magissy
description: Magissy is an Open-World Story-Driven Adult RPG where you take place as a charismatic adventurer and excellent lover, who fears not the danger of dark corners of the Lyrn nor the darkest fantasies of it's behaviors.

name: Shinobi Breaker
description: Hit the shuriken, break the bricks, get ultra instinct and become... The ShinobiBreaker.

name: Critter Clicker
description: Casual farming simulator with unique, flexible gameplay. Autoclicker is built-in and free. Gather resources, upgrade critters and buildings, sell your farm when you want a bigger one and never stop expanding.

name: Nami
description: Nami is a pixel art horror game based on the Brazilian coastline and the works of Junji Ito.

name: 1x! Space Adventure
description: 1x! Space Adventure is an arcade top-down shump with gradually increasing difficulty.

name: Hardcore Trivia
description: Challenge your brains and have a fun time with multiple challenging questions! Hardcore trivia offers questions for many needs. With a Commercial licence, you can arrange a new event easily for example in your bar and provide entertainment to the customers.

name: We Die
description: As a Reaper Class 4, Unit 82 (R482), your current job is to collect the remaining souls from a previous reaper's attempt. Your outcome is determined by your exploration, your reaping, and your attitude towards the many lost souls. You only get one chance to make an impression.

name: Destroy All the Cubes
description: Classic Endless Balls without ads, a unique minimalist design and lots of cannons to destroy all the cubes before they hit the ground. 2 game modes: get as many points as possible in Rush Point and complete all levels.

name: Glorious
description: Forge your Glorious Legacy in blood and bronze, in this roguelike action strategy game. The ancient world has been plunged into chaos and despair as the dark shadow of war looms over the land. Raise your army, summon your heroes, customise and command them to victory!

name: Hack Grid
description: Hack Grid is a puzzle game & love letter to DOS gaming. Only one piece must remain on the board. Each type of piece has its own set of rules. Retro Sound Blaster 16 style audio will accompany you throughout the game. Hack the Grid!

name: Snowman Saves Christmas
description: Snowman Saves Christmas is a 1980s Inspired 2D platformer. Featuring 250 Levels of retro inspired platforming fun split across 5 game modes and Multiple PowerUp items.

name: Atlas Wept
description: A Humanist retro-style RPG game about sincerity and empathy, featuring friendly robot dogs and evil smiley faces.

name: Aisling and the Tavern of Elves
description: “Aisling and the Tavern of Elves” is an Isekai Fantasy-Comedy Dating Sim Visual Novel, where you play as Aisling Whitehorse, a hapless mercenary turned tavern owner eking out a living in the Elven Kingdom of Eiredagh.

name: Mayday: The Survival Island
description: A sudden plane crash interrupts the journey of archaeologist and adventurer John Rudel, leaving him on a deserted and unexplored island, now he must use all his knowledge and skill to survive and return home. Explore, builds, hunts and fights as he tries to survive the mysteries of this island.

name: Amira
description: Amira: A story driven adventure about a girl born in a middle eastern-fantasy world who finds by chance that her life is written and predetermined as she was helping her family, thus she fights for acceptance, love and writing her own life.

name: Amulet of Time: Shadow of La Rochelle
description: When the ghost of the beautiful Diane de Poitiers appears in front of you, you are transported back in time in "Amulet of Time: Shadow of la Rochelle"! Explore France and an incredible love story in this amazing Hidden Object Adventure game.

name: The Maze
description: The Maze was created to challenge you in many different ways, it has such a simple objective, find the end.The Maze is a very large 3d maze built on terrain, with vegetation, trees, water, and different biomes, it stretches many miles with dozens of different challenges,

name: Museum of Extravagance
description: A surrealist experience in a strange museum

name: FireFly
description: This is a story about girls suffering from autism and mild anxiety.

name: The Scary Square
description: The Dark Side Of Mr.Square To Be Discovered.

name: Get Tanked!
description: Why settle for regular tanks when you can drive a super tank? Forget about physics laws and challenge your friends in dynamic and rule-free clashes on one of many exciting arenas. Wishlist now and Get Tanked! in multiplayer combat arena.

name: Hikikomori Life
description: The hard life of a game addict. Feel the atmosphere of loneliness if you can. How infuriating it is when everything distracts you. And so I want to play!

name: Qubie: Invader of Worlds
description: Qubie is an in-development platformer game designed to bring happiness and joy to all. Squash enemies, collect coins, and avoid various traps to progress through the levels. Oh and try to keep your cool!

name: Danger Forever
description:
Danger Forever is 3D Shoot'Em Up with RPG elements. Lone human rides her mecha-dragon through a hostile world of mechanoids and techno-demons.

Unlike most scrolling shooters, you fly through a 3D environment — use it to your advantage, and beware of bumping into walls or ground. Also, instead of traditional showering enemies with bullets, you must think ahead a bit - the fuel/heat system adds more depth to combat.

name: Endless Soul Light Solitaire
description: Help your friends in their search! Classic solitaire in a fantasy setting!

name: The Curse of Esrevni
description: Turn-based strategy game Use your cards well Survive Board game Don't give up !

name: TinyCrack
description: 'Tiny Crack' is a story-based, stage-breaking action game in which you must defeat all enemies within the time limit. Enjoy the action and story of each character and check out different endings.

name: Space Farmers 2
description: Multiplayer madness returns in this anarchic platforming gadget-vania sequel. The Great Leek aims to conquer the Galaxy in Space Farmers 2; The Space Time Leek.

name: Hobbs Home
description: As an escape a man goes out into the wilderness for a nice relaxing camping trip. All is going great until in the middle of the night his curious dog finds himself lost in the forest. Playing as the dog Hobbs you'll experience challenging platforming gameplay as you attempt to get him home.

name: Buyhads
description: Buyhads -2D puzzle platformer in which you have to fight robots to find the codes you need to complete.

name: Sand Witch Adventures
description: Sand Witch Adventures is a roguelike game with bullet-hell elements. Cursed lands full of undead are fraught with wealth and knowledge for the young witches.

name: The Curse of Illmoore Bay
description: A 90's Halloween/Horror comical platforming adventure! Can you stop Illmoore Bay from a world of perpetual Halloween?

name: Nofrills Solitaire
description: A fresh take on Solitaire Klondike with no distractions.

name: Timothy and the Tower of Mu
description: Ascend the tower to save your grandfather in this classic, hardcore action-platformer. The Tower of Mu is waiting for you... Push past each check point to the next awaiting challenge; dashing, jumping, and slinging your way up to the towers peak. Die. learn. Overcome.

name: T.W. Burgess Presents: Pylons
description:
It's a beautiful day to play in the countryside! Just make sure to not play near the PYLONS.

Abandoned in the late 70s and restored today for all to play! Play PYLONS and learn of all the safe ways to avoid an accidental death by PYLONS.

name: Teen Patti Octro
description: Sin descripción

name: Mr. Krasnoludek, Teach Me Your Magic Spells
description:
In this game, a cat named Theremin tries to learn the magic spells of Polish dwarves.
Wield devastating dark magic and explore an enchanted forest.
Experience a day and night system which changes the nature of enemy mobs.
Pick onions and potatoes and stuff, or make a friend!

name: Smack Studio
description: Smack Studio is a sandbox platform fighting game with built-in creation tools for characters and stages.

name: Space Blaster (Lines)
description:
An experimental horror game. A simple space blaster game made from code borrowed off the internet becomes angry it was never finished.
The game starts off simple, but develops itself to entrap the user.

name: Spirited Thief
description: Scout, loot, and get out in Spirited Thief, a tactical turn-based stealth game with a twist. Search ahead as spirit, Trin, and grab the goods as thief, Elaj. Just make sure you have the loot before the guards come looking!

name: RollMe
description: RollMe is a physical-based platform puzzle game, where you can roll over 120 levels in 6 different places. Your ball can change the direction of gravity and you can use jumpers, teleporters to complete levels soon as you can. You can earn points when you collect consumables and finish the levels in a shorter time. Every act has new challenges and riddles.

name: Ghost Suburb Zero
description: Ghost Suburb Zero is a RPG where you, as May, become thrown into a bizzare world and it's many inhabitants- such as, crazed gun-holding girls, bizzare cryptids from foriegn realms, persistantly blurred memories, daemonic brothels, strange bird viruses, and much more!

name: Beyond the Phone Screen
description:
Welcome to the latest and greatest in Geolocation based Augmented Reality entertainment!

Thanks to our deal with Shivers City we've integrated the hit videogame Civilian GO! in an unprecedented way with your town! Enjoy extremely immersive events and activities while you stroll around your beautiful home.

Go out there and make your Mayor proud!

name: Fun, Sun & Mishaps
description: A light-hearted comedy about a girl, an island and a vacation gone wrong. That is, until you meet someone you think has the answer to all your problems. But, is his solution all it's cracked up to be, or is something else going on behind that smile? Find out as you scour a tropical island in search of a way to salvage your ill-fated vacation. Along the way, you will meet many interesting characters, some of whom, might need a little more convincing than others. But, no matter who or what you encounter, it will always be an adventure in......Fun, Sun & Mishaps

name: Gloriana
description:
Gloriana. is a management game set in the year 1550 AD, when Elisabeth becomes Queen of England.

The player is cast as the owner of a small trading company with the goal to gain wealth and influence, through the international trading of goods and accumulation of luxury items, until they achieve sufficient status to be granted the post of counselor to the Queen. The player has time until the year 1588 to achieve this esteemed position, at which point the Spanish Armada attacks England and the game ends.

name: Goat Herd and the Gods
description: Life was pretty peaceful for Atl the Aztec goat herder. That is until the legendary El Chupacabra showed up to decimate his four legged friends. Against such a mighty foe, how can Atl save the day? Maybe with a little divine intervention? Join our cowardly goat herd on his journey and find out in Goat Herd and the Gods! Goat Herd and the Gods is a short point and click adventures game, and is the second title from Dropped Monocle's team.

name: Graveyard
description:
Short game about three kids trying to save a friend.

Dave, Phil and Clarence will have to cooperate to reach their goal, and save their friend Ron from a gruesome fate.

Entry for MAGS September 2016.

name: Grr! Bearly Sane
description:
Daniel is having a bad day.

Forced to wear a rancid bear suit and endure endless torment from his boss, and an endless multitude of horrid children, just so he can afford to keep his small crummy suburban flat, Dan finally SNAPS!

name: Hang On
description:
Martha is getting away from it all, up in the clouds on the lonely but peaceful slopes of the Trollspitze mountain. When a quick trip to the village below goes awry, who will come to her rescue? And is there any truth in the local legend of an abominable snowman?

Featuring:

* Two playable characters!

* Sublime alpine scenery!

* Vertiginous thrills!

* Accurate bird audio from the public domain!

name: Headbanger's Heaven: A Rock & Roll Adventure
description:
Jason Miller is a typical teenage rocker. Loves to stay up all night and sleep all day. And of course, headbang to his favourite music.

When he enters a competition in Kerplow Rock Magazine, he never dreamed he would actually win first prize!

But won, he has. And now he gets to spend the afternoon with his favourite band, Uptempo Maniacs, and get a private performance of their new song.

He is SO excited! He still can't believe it, even when the limo driver drops him off at the band's mansion.

He has his autograph book, all ready to get autographs from all 6 of the band members. And he CANNOT WAIT for the special private performance.

But if he thinks he's in for an easy afternoon, he's got another think coming.

name: Heatwave
description:
You are but mere words.
Would you speak as with that mask,
With what lies underneath?

Heatwave is a short story set in the same world as Death Wore Endless Feathers. It takes place in a future California, where Dai Araiguma is playing a VR game in the middle of an abnormally tenacious heatwave.

name: Agora: Soul of the Oracle
description:
Reminiscent of Diablo, but instead of maps, the game consists of eighteen 3D globes. There are no boundaries, you can walk all the way around the globe if you want to. This does get somewhat confusing at times though. In order to move to the next globe, you have to find all the pieces of a stone disk.

However, your enemies will also pick up the disk pieces and you have to defeat them to get them back. When you die, you are reincarnated at your "oracle", a stone structure which you have to defend. If your oracle is destroyed, you can no longer be resurrected. This is also true for your enemies.

name: Teen Patti Gold
description: Sin descripción

name: Barricadez ReVisited
description: This is the Crafting × Tower Defense game you have been looking for. Gather materials and items to upgrade your base and protect a cradle after the collapse of civilization. Mine and explore in caves In The Caves, you can mine randomly generated resources that are used to craft traps and blocks. Venture deeper and deeper to find a number of rare materials and secrets. Craft the perfect defense In your base, you can craft dozens of facilities and traps to repel approaching enemies. Mix and match the attributes of each trap to counter each attacker's behavior and survive one more day. Immersive story Dive deeper and survive longer to uncover pieces of the truth. Find out what happened to cause the destruction of the world and the origin of our little robot!

name: Sprite Generator
description: Sprite Generator lets you rapidly create thousands of interesting procedurally generated sprites.

name: Tangent Rush
description: Tangent Rush is a casual game with unique controls and tricky levels. Challenge yourself through dodging obstacles and breaking records. Get the hang of throwing yourself around tangentially and getting to the goal in time!
